name: Impulse (arthurion98, Ysengrine, AmanBerdyev, GuillaumePv, SmartWizard)
description:
Impulse is a neural network puzzler where you have to solve actual biological computation. It aims to provide both a fun and interactive way to understand the basics of biological neural network process and how it can solve problems for our body and brain everyday. > How to play
  • LEFT CLICK on neuron - start  an axon (cannot start on output neuron (filled circle) )
  • HOLD CLICK - draw axon
  • RELEASE CLICK on neuron - finish axon (cannot end on input neuron (play circle) )
  • RIGHT CLICK on axon - delete axon
  • SPACE - start/end simulation to test your network 
  • ESC - pause/unpause
> Our Team
  • Melissa Flagella
  • Berdyev Aman
  • Guillaume Pavé
  • Merlin Leuenberger
  • Tâm Nguyên
